titles.title: Supporting NEW BUSINESSES Act
Supporting NEW BUSINESSES Act
Supporting New Entrepreneurs and Workers By Undoing and Streamlining Inhibitors to Nascent Enterprises through Supporting Successful Efficiency Solutions Act

A bill to require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to provide awards to recognize State and local governments that improve the process of forming a new business, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
